title: Mysterious Disappearance
story: On the sleepy town of Willowbrook,
A young girl has disappeared is utterly hawkless.

suspect.name: Evelyn Greene
suspect.alibi: Evelyn claims to have been home alone the entire night of the girl's disappearance.
suspect.confirmation: There are no witnesses or evidence to confirm or dispute her alibi.

witness.name: Mrs. Rosemary Anderson
witness.observation: Mrs. Anderson observed a strange figure lurking near the girl's house on the day of her disappearance. The figure was wearing a black raincoat and had a distinctive walking style.
witness.description: Mrs. Anderson is an elderly lady who lives next door to the girl's house. She spends her time gardening and keeping an eye on the neighborhood.

npcs.name: Officer Tom Mason
npcs.dialogue: I've been investigating this case since day one. There's something suspicious about Evelyn, but I can't find any solid evidence.

npcs.name: Dr. Linda Chambers
npcs.dialogue: As a psychologist, I can confirm that Evelyn has a history of odd behavior and may be capable of committing such a crime.

clues.front gate: Footprints leading away from the house
clues.playground: Piece of a torn photo with a mysterious emblem
